title: El Salvador Producer Prices
description: Producer Prices in El Salvador decreased to 127.59 points in October from 127.81 points in September of 2022. Producer Prices in El Salvador averaged 118.19 points from 1998 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 183.94 points in July of 2008 and a record low of 95.92 points in December of 1998. In El Salvador, the Producer Price Index measures the average change in price of goods and services sold by manufacturers and producers in the wholesale market during a given period. This page provides - El Salvador Producer Prices - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Reserve Bank of El Salvador
